oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Foreign paper, watermark: Dorling Gregory, London, 1869.
Written in black ink, 14 lines per page.
Ms. imperfect: folios missing, folios in brittle condition, badly water-stained, frayed edges. Binding in poor condition.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
